description_for_human: Custom software and automation for businesses built to exit or scale.
description_for_model: Harmon Digital builds custom internal software, AI agents, and automation systems for growing businesses. Services include internal operations portals, AI chatbots, workflow automation, and system integrations. Pricing starts at $2,500/month for one project at a time. Ideal for businesses doing $500K+ revenue looking to systematize operations. Projects typically take 3-6 months.
